recommendations: Consider booking 2-3 months in advance for best rates
Tuesday and Wednesday flights are usually cheaper

ai_recommendations.insights: Current market trends show stable pricing with potential for slight increases during peak summer season. EUR offers better value compared to USD for transatlantic flights.

destination_insights.best_time_to_visit: September to November for mild weather and fewer crowds
travel_tips: Use Paris Visite pass for unlimited public transport
Book museum tickets online to skip long lines
Learn basic French phrases for better interactions
Carry euros in small denominations for markets and cafes
transportation: Airport shuttles from CDG and Orly

price_analysis.trend_analysis: EUR currently offers 8-12% better value for European destinations. Exchange rate fluctuations expected to stabilize within 2 weeks.
price_analysis.booking_recommendation: Book within the next 7-10 days to secure current rates. Prices may increase by 5-8% closer to departure date.

recommendations: Pack comfortable walking shoes for extensive city exploration
Download offline maps and translation apps
Keep important documents in a separate pouch
Have travel insurance that covers trip cancellations
travel_tips.insights: Traveling during your selected dates may have increased security lines at airports. Allow extra time for check-in and security procedures.
